mapper.select: select * from issue order by regdate desc
select * from (select * from issue where sysdate-regdate <=1 order by regdate desc) where rownum <=3
select * from issue t1 left join (select ino, count(*) cnt from opinion group by ino) t2 on t1.no =t2.ino order by regdate desc
select * from (select * from issue t1 left join (select ino, count(*) cnt from opinion group by ino) t2 on t1.no =t2.ino order by cnt desc) where rownum = 1

select 'life' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='life' union select 'etc' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='etc' union select 'game' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='game' union select 'it' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='it' union select 'culture' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='culture' union select 'sports' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='sports' union select 'politic' as cate , count(*) as cnt from issue where cate ='politic'
select category.*, nvl(t1.cnt,0) as cnt from category left join (select cate, count(*) as cnt from issue group by cate) t1 on category.key = t1.cate
